title: The budget manager at Trump asked: "Do we really need government-funded research at all?"
subtitle: Although it has since been deleted, Mick Mulvani asked this question in Facebook in response to a scientific study that calls into question the role of the Zeka virus in causing infant microvale.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Representative Mick Mulvani, who was recently selected as a candidate for the Trump Department for the post of Director of the Bureau of Administration and Budget, posed the question "Do we really need government-funded research at all?" on Facebook.
